Agentic AI.notes: Reinforced understanding of Agentic AI as comprising autonomous, proactive multi-agent systems using natural language and advanced coordination to solve complex problems with limited human oversight, based on IBM 2025 state of the art overview.

agentic RAG.notes: Researchers are embedding autonomous AI agents into retrieval-augmented generation pipelines to enhance adaptability, scalability, and context awareness. They focus on dynamic retrieval strategy management, iterative refinement of context, multiagent collaboration, and tool use for complex workflows. Applications span healthcare, finance, and education. Challenges include scaling, ethical decision-making, and performance optimization. Recent surveys provide taxonomies of architectures, practical implementation strategies, and highlight the integration of agentic design patterns such as reflection, planning, and collaboration frameworks. This knowledge was updated based on a comprehensive 2025 survey paper on Agentic RAG.

Model Context Protocol.notes: MCP is an open-source standard to connect AI models like ChatGPT or Claude to external data sources, tools, and workflows. Enables advanced AI actions like calendar access, database querying, and code generation. Benefits all ecosystem players: developers, AI agents, and users.

quantum mechanics.notes: Recent 2025 breakthroughs include quantum computers simulating nuclear physics on 100+ qubits, tiny quantum clocks revealing surprising energy costs, surpassing Heisenberg's measurement limits, topological insulator-generated terahertz light, advanced quantum sensor networks for dark matter detection, and discovery of novel electron quantum states. All represent significant advances pushing quantum tech and fundamental understanding.

biology.notes: Searched multiple trusted scientific databases and news sources for latest biology discoveries in 2025 but no notable new breakthroughs found at this time. Will continue monitoring and update when available.
